评论详情: This top was perfect!  True to size. I ordered a the blue in Medium. (I am 5.5 123 lbs.) loved that it is lined and the bell sleeve with cold shoulder design made it so comfortable and the fit was excellent. The quality was good and material lining was thicker than anticipated and I received so many compliments. I highly recommend this top.

This pink top is sparkly and is a beautiful color of pink.  The material is a good quality and it fits well.  I sent it back because the event that I purchased it for required me to wear a dress instead.  It would be great for Valentine's Day.

All reviews said to order up for my size, it’s big.  I should’ve ordered my size!  Bottom hem is edge of sequin fabric, not a proper hem.  I’ll still wear it for new years, I’ll be in a dark bar anyway!

I purchase this with the upcoming holidays in mind. Thought it would be perfect with slacks and heels. I LOVE the color purple, which is what I ordered, but the purple you see on-line is NOT the color I received. This saddened me because the color on-line was so pretty!! I haven't decided if I'm keeping it or will be returning it, so just be aware the colors online may be different than what you receive.

I wore this top to a New Year's Eve party. I needed something festive and not too formal, it was perfect. I am 5'4 and weigh 145lb and I bought my normal size M. It fits me very well without being too clingy. The fabric and lining have a little bit of a stretch and this top feels comfortable. It's a keeper for me.

评论概述: Excellent well fitting top perfect for Scarlett Night on cruise!
评论详情: Comfortable, fun top. Fits very well. Not cheap, substantial. Fits true to size. Highly recommend for a fun night out. Bought for Scarlett Night on Virgin Voyage cruise and it was perfect. Would be great for Christmas and New Year's as well.
Fits well I get lots of compliments when I wear it. Highly recommend. So fun dressed up or even with jeans.
Very pretty blouse. Did not wear it because it was too big. Function that I bought it for had passed.

评论概述: Love the top but be sure to inspect it when you receive it - Mine had missing sequins
评论详情: Update:  I received my replacement and it looks good!GRACE KARIN Womens Sequin Tops 3/4 Sleeve Glitter Sparkly Party Blouse V-Neck Dressy Tops for Evening Party:  I've been shopping for a holiday top for December and just could not find anything l.ocally.  So I decided to try ordering  something from amazon.  I really did love this top, the style and fit.  However, there were sequins missing from the front of the shirt right around my belly button.  I would never have bought a top with this defect from a store so I returned it for an exact replacement.  I am hoping that the new item will not have the same flaw.  If so, I will update this review.  You can see the missing sequins in the middle of the 2nd photo.  It would not have been a big deal if it was on the back or side, but was very obvious on the front middle.

Bought this for a holiday party. I was nervous the top would be too snug around my waist (where I hold my weight) but I sized up and it fits well. I’m 5’9 and 180 and bought an XL. Shown here but just over yoga pants but plan on wearing with palazzo dress pants. Quality is nice too. Has a liner that isn’t see through. Not itchy or scratchy either.
As pictured!
I loved the blouse. It is has great look and classy. Perfect fit.
The top is beautiful.  Great quality.
The ideal top for a party!
I bought this for New Year’s Eve.  It fits nice like the pink.  It has slits in the sleeves to show your arms - I couldn't tell that from the model.
Love the color and fit.  Will be great for NYE!
Fits great!
I really like this top. The color looks great, looks to be assembled good, the fit is okay (size M and not tight.)  The reason why I didn't give 5 stars is, because the sequins snag on each other.

Beautiful but runs small. I usually wear a medium to large. I read the reviews and sized up to a large. It fits snug, wearable but snug. I like a bit more room in my blouses, and think an extra large might be too much room. Sadly I'm returning this beauty.
I bought this for a wedding.  It is nicely made, soft on the skin, looks good on me.  I do wish it was a little looser around my hips, that's probably just me though!

I bought this blouse for an event, I thought it was too shiny, but instead it was very successful, I wore it with a pair of pants that also had some shine. I received many good compliments, I loved it! Size L

This blouse is exactly what I expected.  The color and fit was perfect.  It’s perfect for my Vegas trip.  I would say it was a little heavy and a little scratchy!  But, overall it was a very pretty blouse!

Quality is really good, cut runs smaller than it should. Already losing sequins after first wash. That's why 4 stars and not 5

Just got this top today.  After reading the reviews I chose to order a size larger than I normally wear as I have a little extra fluff and didn't want it too snug fitting. This top fits as expected.  love the color  good for fancy occasions

This is a nice top and has great sequins and color it’s just a little “older” style, I do like the peekaboo shoulder and the unique arms it’s just has an older style than I prefer. I did return because I had an other option it just wasn’t youthful enough for me. But it is a nice quality garment.

This top laid well and was cut nicely to hide my midsection. I definitely would order a size up and like previous reviews mentioned, it will pull your hair but I think that’s the norm for sequin tops. I’m happy with it.

I wore this to the Cher Show musical. I felt great, I looked great. Definitely size up for space and coverage. I am going to order another darker color and I think it will look marvelous! Some sequin did fall off, but I don't think it's an issue, there are plenty of sequin and plenty of sparkle!

Love this top!  Can be very dressy or cute with jeans.  The stretch makes it comfortable, and I love the sleeves with the cutouts.  It handwashed nice.  I sized down because the sleeves can be a little longer than I like, but I didn't notice much of a difference between the fit on the body XL versus L.

I do like this top. It does run a little bit small. I would go up a size. I wish I could return the one I have. I’ve never won it in a different color also I really wish that you would let me exchange it for a different size and and color. Let me know if you will.
Unfortunately, this blouse was not for me. It wasn't the color I thought it would be, and I didn't like the material. It may be great for someone else, but just wasn't for me.

Great shirt! I'm 5'6" 200 lbs and I bought a 2xl. Fits perfect! This is a must have!

评论概述: Packs well for travel and instant glamour!
评论详情: I cruise 8-10 times a year and I have a pair of black silk pants I wear each evening with a different top for packing light. This gold blouse is perfect for formal night! Easy to pack. I wash it by hand in cold water and lay it on a towel to dry when I get home ready for the next cruise!
It was pretty with a nice fit but some of the sequins fell off.
Top is cute and well made. Runs very small. I’m 5’4” 157lbs and the 2x fit. Order bigger than you think you’d need.

评论概述: The blouse was not like the photo.
评论详情: The top didn't have the crossover on the front. It was plain. The sleeves were completely different than the picture. There were some stitching errors. I'm not sure if I was sent the wrong top or if the listing has the wrong picture. I returned. I would have been happy with it if the front of the blouse matched the picture. Be aware that the back has a cut-out so you can see part of your back. The fabric is nice. The sequins are pretty. The color is pretty. If it matched the photo I would not have returned.

The blouse Is cute - I always order a large because i like my tops “roomy” - I am actually a medium. This top is tight and form fitting - and also short coming to my belly button - pretty but has to go
Loved this top but I had to return it. The sleeves felt awkward to me. Wish they weren’t slit

The shirt is really pretty, but the placement of the front seam is placed wrong. It should go under the breast, but instead it goes directly across it. Just looks strange to me. I will be returning it. Otherwise, I like the top.
I'm about 160 lbs and a size 8-10. It wasn't flattering to me at all. Too big in the chest to fit in the waist, so I had to return.

The quality is very good I ordered 2 sizes just to make sure one would fit well and even the largest size didn't fit well for me 2xl and 3xl. The arms and chest area was good but the tummy not so much. If you are curvy on the plus side and don't mind the shirt riding up or showing the tummy rolls then this good. I'm 5'4 235 lbs 47D. Personally I didn't feel comfortable.
Love the picture, but when trying it on it was too tight for the size I got.... normally I get Large, but in this style I reckon I should have gotten XL.  Sent it back!

Fit correctly to size.  Not too low cut but enough for evening wear. I did not like the purple color I had ordered, it was very bright.  I ended up with the rose that was also brighter than expected but kept it since it fit well. This top is beautiful but runs small. I ordered a large which usually gives me room around my bra line and shoulders. This is very clingy and tight on my back so the bra line was very visible.  Definitely a bummer because it's very pretty.
This blouse is very nice and I’ve received several compliments on it. The color is bright and vibrant. It fits well and I recommend it.
It’s very pretty and looks nice on but very scratchy feeling from the bedazzle on the outside of the shirt.
Fits well to size I ordered. Color and design like the photo. Very happy with this purchase. Felt beautiful when I put it on ❤️

El color es muy bonito,  queda un poco pequeña,  te recomiendo comprar una talla más grande,  la costura del frente no queda debajo del pecho sino encima,  esto me pareció un poco raro. Pero muy alegre para estas fiestas y el brillo precioso.  Ni mucho ni poco.
I  ordered one size up  an X-Large I could have ordered a XX-Large.  Runs a little small.

评论概述: I really wanted to like this top, but...
评论详情: I DO love the color of this top- sort of a cross between champagne and rose gold and it IS very sparkly. However, the size was larger than expected so the thin lining of the top is constantly riding up and getting wrinkled and needs to be pulled down all the time to keep the back and hips looking smooth. However, that's nothing compared to how 'snaggy' ALL of the sequins and thread are. The sleeves are forever getting stuck to the rest of the top, unless you hold your arms away from your body the entire time you have it on. In short, it's a pretty high maintenance piece, and I don't see it lasting past the two times I've worn it since ordering it. I'm sure better quality items exist out there, somewhere.
Love the top. Received many compliments. Top wore very well. I Loved it!!
The blouse fits well. The “bling” is just right!

I liked this and wanted to keep it but sizing runs small
